content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters in this title are 21 years of age and above!

The themes in this game include:
- Dubious consent, sexual activities involving BDSM (Bondage & Discipline, Dominance & Submission, Sadism & Masochism), and other fantasy kinks or fetishes.
- Full female nudity throughout the entire game (the game features a censored mode).
- Some strong language, alcohol, and drug use (fantasy items).

name: Wrapturous Adventure (A Yuri BDSM-Theme Game) Demo
